Name: Rocky Trail
Description: You are on a trail with a few rocks.

Name: South of House
Description: The south side of a white house facing you are. No door, and all the windows are barred.

Name: Canyon View
Description: You are at the top of the Great Canyon. Do you wish to jump? There is water at the bottom!

Name: Forest
Description: You are surrounded by a large forest full of beautiful nature.

Name: West of House
Description: You are in a vast field to the west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Name: Behind House
Description: Behind the white house, in one of the corners, there is a small window which is slightly ajar. Rats??

Name: Dense Woods
Description: The woods is packed with trees, blocking out a lot of the sunlight. There is sunlight to the east.

Name: North of House
Description: You are facing the north side of a barred up white house that has no door. Break in?

Name: Clearing
Description: In the clearing you bask in the sunlight. There is a forest surrounding you on the west and south.
